src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Ka Mosupologo, Sara Danius, mokwaledi-mogolo wa Komiti ya Nobel ya Sekgele sa tsa Bokwadi kwa Swedish Academy, o phatlaladitse mo thulaganyong ya seromamowa mo Sveriges Radio kwa Sweden go re komiti e itlhobogile ka maiteko a go itshwaraganya le Bob Dylan, mabapi le go bo a gapile Sekgele sa Bokwadi sa 2016, ka ba nna ba palalwa ke go mo fitlhelela.
hyp_text: E e monate, Sara Danius, setlhodi sa sechaba se sekgolo sa Lesedi la Literature ka Swedish Academy, ke tlhapi ya go tlhapi ka radio program ka Sveriges Radio ka Sweden, sechaba e ne e leboga Bob Dylan ka go tlogela 2016 Nobel Prize ka Literature, e ne e leboga go tlogela e e tla kgona.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ref_text: Tlhatlogo ya bolwetse e tlhotlheleditse mmuso ya kwa India go tsenya mo tirisong go anamisa batshwari ba dikolobe mo mafelong a amegileng thata, go aba dikete tsa matsela a thibelang menang le dibolaya leroborobo la diji.
hyp_text: E kgale e kile ya go dira ditshwanelo tsa go ya go dira gore direng ditlhapi tse kgolo tsa makgolo a kgaolo, go tswelang dikgwebo tsa kgaolo tse kwa kgale, go tshwenya kgwedi e kgaolo.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ref_text: Go bolelwa a ne a le dingwaga tse di fa gare ga masome mabedi le masome a mararo. Bieber o ntshitse molaetsa a re, ”ntswa lefa ke ne se teng fa kotsi e ya matlhotlapelo e diragala, dikakanyo le dithapelo tsame di na le ba lelapa la motshwasetlhabelo.”
hyp_text: Ke kwaletswe ke e 20. E kwaletswe go rra, Bieber re tlhokomedi: '[W]hile ke e neng a ne a tlhoka ka tsamaiso e e thuso, ke tlogelwang ke go dira tona ya mokgosi wa motho wa motho.'

src_text: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.
ref_text: Ditshupetso tse ka dinako dingwe di nang le tirisodikgoka di ne di tlhotlhelediwa ke go palelwa ke go tshwara ditlhopho, tse dingwe tsa tsone di sa bolong go se nne gone fa e sale ka 2011.
hyp_text: Ditlhopho tse mmele tsa tse di kgona tse di kgona ke tsamaisedi ka lekgotla le tse di kgona tse di kgona tse di kgona ka 2011.

src_text: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
ref_text: E kgona go diriwa bosesane thata, e bo e kgomarediwa mo tshiping e nngwe. Nako e nngwe e kgona go dirwa tshesane thata mo e leng go re gore o nagana gore e ne ya dirisetswa go itshasa mo letsogon kgabisa ditshwantsho tse di pentilweng ka seatla mo dibukeng tse di bitswang ”illuminated manuscripts”.
hyp_text: E e le ka go kaletseng, go dira ka tsebogo ya metal. E e le ka letsatsi, go dira ka tsebogo ya motho o tsebego, go dira ka kgetho ya kgethologong ya 'manuscripts e e ilungwane'.

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: Magosi a le Mararo e ne e le nngwe ya dipaka tse di tletseng tshololo ya madi thata mo hisitoring ya China wa Bogologolo, batho ba le diketekete ba ne ba swa ba lwela go nna mo setilong se se kwa godimodimo mo ntlong e kgolo ya segosi kwa Xi'an.
hyp_text: Tharo ya Bophirama ke motseng wa kgale wa Sesorong sa China a le mongwe wa lefatswe ka tlase, ba ba kgona ba le kgale le fa ke tlase mo go tswaletseng ya go kgale ya Xi'an.

src_text: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
ref_text: Nako e ditiragalo di diragetse ka yona e bidiwa "High Middle Ages" - nako ya ditso tsa Uropa, a makgolo a fetileng a dingwaga (AD 1000-1300).
hyp_text: Go tselewang ke lefatswe ke kgatlhong ya madi a go tswaletso e e kgona lefatswe ke kgatlhong ya Phatlhatlhabolong ya Borwa, ke kgatlhong ya dipalo tsa Borwa tsa 11, 12, le 13, le kgatlhong ya go tlhola AD 1000–1300.

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.

src_text: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src_text: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
ref_text: Diphologolo tse di sa bonaleng motlhofo jaaka bera e khunou ya Yuropa, phiri ya mafatshe, ntsu, morubisi, lynx, katse ya naga, le capercaillie di ka bonwa teng, mmogo le ditshidi tse dingwe tse di tlwaelesegileng.
hyp_text: Go tshwane tsamaiso a tlhapi, ka go tlogelwa ke European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat le capercaillie, go tlogelwa ke go tlhapi le go tswaego.
